Kevin let me know that IFC (Independent Film Channel) is showing 
three samurai films **tonight** in honor of "Kill Bill Vol. 2" coming 
out.  (Which reminds me, I need to get the SHQ calendar updated!)

"Kill" (1968)
"Three Outlaw Samurai" (1964)
"Samurai Spy" (1965)

None are Shinsengumi-related, but I know many of us are still 
interested in samurai films.  There's also a 15-minute "making of" 
for the new movie.

phil (whose head is still spinning over "Cruel Story...")
